lom:description.lom:string: This is a very good set of lessons all around the earth sciences. "Following are Earth Science lessons Scott Johnson an elementary school teacher in Lincoln Elementary in Grand Forks, has developed. These lessons are geared toward and tested by 5-8 grade students." These are very good, all designed in the same manner so interface confusion should be minimal, and allows students to proceed at their own pace. Chapter 1, Plate tectonics includes 3 large lessons, with many sections for teacher and student use Chapter 2, Earthquakes and Volcanoes 3 large lessons with same types of materials available Chapter 3, cones, eruptions and pyroclasts 3 large lessons with same types of materials available Chapter 4, Rockes and minerals 5 lessons Chapter 5 Prehistoric Earth 1 lesson

lom:keyword.lom:string: Earth sciences, Volcanology, earthquakes, plate tectonics, earth sciences,
